subject: Ryder Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: A deluge delayed Ryder Cup play for more than seven hours and a drenched American team needed new rain gear to end the day with a slim lead over the Europeans in the yet-unfinished fourball matches.
snippet: A deluge delayed Ryder Cup play for more than seven hours and a drenched American team needed new rain gear to end the day with a slim lead over the Europeans in the yet-unfinished fourball matches.
